title: Ring of resist corrosion
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Jewellery                                                                                                        |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Ring of resist corrosion                                                                                         |
| Icon | [![Ring of resist corrosion.png](/images/5/56/Ring_of_resist_corrosion.png)](/File:Ring_of_resist_corrosion.png) |

|   |                                                                                 |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A ring that provides partial protection from all sources of acid and corrosion. |

A **ring of resist corrosion** grants its wearer [corrosion](/Corrosion "Corrosion") resistance. This reduces [acid](/Acid "Acid") damage by 50%, gives a 50% chance to resist the corrosion [status effect](/Status_effect "Status effect"), and gives immunity to [clouds of acidic fog](/Cloud#Acidic_fog "Cloud"). Multiple sources of resist corrosion do not stack.

## Desirability

Acid is a rare element, but some form of rCorr is nice to have (at least as a swapout). It's particularly good throughout [the Slime Pits](/The_Slime_Pits "The Slime Pits"), which are filled with [acid blobs](/Acid_blob "Acid blob"). Having rCorr is also useful against a number of enemies, such as [oklob plants](/Oklob_plant "Oklob plant"), [entropy weavers](/Entropy_weaver "Entropy weaver"), [goliath frogs](/Goliath_frog "Goliath frog"), and [caustic shrikes](/Caustic_shrike "Caustic shrike").

Resist corrosion *does* protect against the \*Corr [artefact](/Artefact "Artefact") property. Wearing this ring just to protect against \*Corr is questionable, though.

## History

- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), there was an [amulet of resist corrosion](/Amulet_of_resist_corrosion "Amulet of resist corrosion") instead of a ring.
- Prior to the corrosion overhaul of [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), corrosion resistance offered a 90% chance of negating corrosion effects against vulnerable weapons and armour. This stacked with other sources of resistance.

Ring of resist corrosion

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Type Jewellery
Name Ring of resist corrosion
Icon
A ring that provides partial protection from all sources of acid and corrosion.

A ring of resist corrosion grants its wearer corrosion resistance. This reduces acid damage by 50%, gives a 50% chance to resist the corrosion status effect, and gives immunity to clouds of acidic fog. Multiple sources of resist corrosion do not stack.

Desirability

Acid is a rare element, but some form of rCorr is nice to have (at least as a swapout). It's particularly good throughout the Slime Pits, which are filled with acid blobs. Having rCorr is also useful against a number of enemies, such as oklob plants, entropy weavers, goliath frogs, and caustic shrikes.

Resist corrosion does protect against the *Corr artefact property. Wearing this ring just to protect against *Corr is questionable, though.

History

  • Prior to 0.18, there was an amulet of resist corrosion instead of a ring.
  • Prior to the corrosion overhaul of 0.15, corrosion resistance offered a 90% chance of negating corrosion effects against vulnerable weapons and armour. This stacked with other sources of resistance.
